QueryDefinition.Query: With pat AS( select patid from {sc}.patient order by patid limit {pagesize} offset {pagesize*page} ) SELECT DISTINCT a.patid, a.frd, case when yob > 1800 then yob else yob + 1800 end YEAR_OF_BIRTH, case when mob > 0 then mob else null end as MONTH_OF_BIRTH, null DAY_OF_BIRTH, case when gender = 1 then 'M' when gender = 2 then 'F' else null end as gender, MOD(a.patid, 100000) CARE_SITE_ID, GREATEST(a.frd, b.uts) as observation_period_start_date, LEAST(a.tod, b.lcd, a.deathdate, to_date(CONCAT(RIGHT(current_database(), 6), '01'), 'YYYYMMDD')) as observation_period_end_date, deathdate, toreason, CASE WHEN toreason = 1 and deathdate is not null and deathdate > '1987-01-01' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as DIED, null as RACE_CONCEPT_ID, null as RACE_SOURCE_VALUE, accept, 32880 PeriodTypeConceptId -- 44814725 Period inferred by algorithm -> 32880 Standard algorithm from pat join {sc}.patient a on a.patid=pat.patid join {sc}.practice b on MOD(a.patid, 100000) = b.pracid
